name: @codewalk/claude-plugin
description: Claude marketplace plugin for codewalk - track AI-assisted code changes

scripts.postversion: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); const mp='../.claude-plugin/marketplace.json'; const m=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(mp)); m.plugins[0].version=pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync(mp,JSON.stringify(m,null,2)+'\n');"
